text: The McArabia is a pita bread sandwich located at all McDonald's restaurants in Arab countries and Pakistan. ==Names in different countries== It is known as the Grilled Chicken foldover in Singapore, Malaysia and South Africa as McOriental in Spain and France, the McTurco in Turkey, Greek Mac in Greece and Cyprus, and McKebab in Israel. ==References== Category:McDonald's foods Category:Sandwiches
title: McArabia
